item.title: Slack bot with Nodejs
item.description: Build your own personal slack bot in few steps. In this post we’ll navigate through process of creating the bot. Slack setup First create a slack workspace Give your workspace a name Create a new bot at slack apps Give your new app a name Choose workspace you created before to install the app Then go to Features > OAuth & Permissions screen to scroll down to Bot Token Scopes to specify the OAuth scopes, select app_mentions and chat_write to enable the bot to send messages.
